question: Many people believe that good planning is the key factor to success in life, while other believe that other factors like hard work or luck are important. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
text: It is true that there are several factors that come behind someone’s success. Some people constitute that a well-thought-out plan is the main reason, while others consider other elements such as diligence or good fortune are more important. This essay will discuss both perspectives and reasons why I believe that successful achievement results from several factors.

On the one hand, there is no doubt that planning skill is a crucial element in one’s success. Firstly, going through a planned path allows people to achieve goals more effectively. This is because it is easier to attain singular aims by following specific steps. Secondly, a plan helps people to track their progress clearly, whether they miss any important information. Finally, when making a plan, they can predict foreseeable scenarios which help to minimize potential risks and take opportunities.

On the other hand, another opinion is that other proponents are considered vital keys to success in many aspects of life. To acquire knowledge and experience, people need to put in hard work. Being persistent ensures people focus on work and pursue their passions without giving up. Another element is having a good fortune to develop. For instance, a lot of people started to store face masks since not many people were aware of Covid-19. Then, when the pandemic became worse they sold others at a very high price.
In conclusion, both sides of the argument have their advantages. However, my personal view is that not only good planning but also other factors are equally important to an individual’s success.
